text: Little Nicky is a 2000 American fantasy comedy movie that was produced by Jack Giarraputo and Robert Simonds and was directed by Steven Brill. It stars Adam Sandler and is set in New York City. == Cast == * Adam Sandler as Nicky * Rhys Ifans as Adrian * Tom 'Tiny' Lister, Jr. as Cassius * Harvey Keitel as Dad (Satan) * Allen Covert as Todd * Patricia Arquette as Valerie Veran * Robert Smigel as the voice of Mr. Beefy * Rodney Dangerfield as Grandpa (Lucifer) * Jonathan Loughran as John * Peter Dante as Peter * Leah Lail as Christa * Jackie Sandler as Jenna * Dana Carvey as the Referee * Michael McKean as Chief of Police * Kevin Nealon as Stanley the Gatekeeper * Reese Witherspoon as Holly (Nicky's Mom) * Blake Clark as Jimmy the Demon ===Cameos=== Other than the cast there was also a lot of cameos in the movie: * Regis Philbin as Himself * Ozzy Osbourne as Himself * Bill Walton as Himself * Dan Marino as Himself * Henry Winkler as Himself * Rob Schneider as The Townie (Playing his character from The Waterboy) * Carl Weathers as Chubbs (Playing his character from Happy Gilmore) * Clint Howard as Nipples * Jon Lovitz as Peeper * Fred Wolf and the Harlem Globetrotters * Radio Man as Himself * Quentin Tarantino as Blind deacon * Ellen Cleghorne as Mom at Globetrotters game * Laura Harring as Mrs. Dunleavy == Ratings == Little Nicky gained mainly negative reviews: * Rotten Tomatoes - 22% * Metacritic - 38% out of 100 == Other websites == * * Category:2000 comedy movies Category:2000s fantasy-comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Happy Madison movies Category:Movies about brothers Category:Movies set in New York City Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Screenplays by Adam Sandler
title: Little Nicky
